fields.name: Master Ball
fields.description: Maintain a 50% or better catch rate on Legendaries.

fields.name: 40 Club
fields.description: Reach Level 40, the highest level in Pokemon GO

fields.name: Traveler
fields.description: Collect Pokemon from at least 2 continents.

fields.name: Prospector
fields.description: Complete all Gold type badges, yes, even the Dragon one

fields.name: Pidgey Farmer
fields.description: Catch over 2000 Pidgey. That's a lot of candy

fields.name: SHINY!!!
fields.description: Have at least 1 Shiny Pokemon. Lucky SOB

fields.name: STARDUST!!!
fields.description: It's one hell of a drug. Reached 1MM Stardust.

fields.name: Pokemaster
fields.description: Was voted Pokemaster of the month for being a good influence on the community

fields.name: Team Sprocket
fields.description: Participated in a bike-based raid group. Roll out!
